website_summaries.verdict: A great affordable option for those who want to smoke meats at home.
pros: Features adjustable temperature control from 175 to 325 degrees
Two chrome-plated cooking grids can be adjusted to different heights
cons: Loses heat quickly when door is opened, which is necessary to replenish the wood and liquid

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had been talking about wanting a smoker for quite a while. I wanted to surprise him with one, but I didn't want to spend too much because I was worried that he might lose interest in it quickly (like SO many "toys" he just HAS to have. Lol). This has been a great smoker to start with. He's really gotten into it! He says it works perfectly. Everything so far has come out tasting fantastic and smoked perfectly. It's compact yet very functional. We've smoked pieces large enough to feed 6 people and have leftovers and that was using only one of the racks.
customer_reviews.author: kdw77

customer_reviews.title: I've used it every weekend for the last four months ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it every weekend for the last four months except when I got married. I've been able to fit things as large as a seven pound pork tenderloin with wings, to15 brats, all the way to a 15 pound beef brisket. I adore it. TWO BIG THINGS! 1. Make sure the wood chip pan is not all the way against the right side and heating element. I had grease build up there once and a small fire. Nothing major, just give any drippings room to fall. 2. Cure the cabinet before use. Spray it with a liberal amount of canola spray and then just smoke some wood on high heat for an hour and never clean the cabinet out.
customer_reviews.author: JohhnyDamage

customer_reviews.title: Please do not waste your $ to buy this
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy customer. Please do not waste your $ to buy this. The temperature adjustment is basically random. I used it twice so far, and already have experienced a lot inconsistency of the temperature: one point when I set the temperature high, I got 200 degrees; one point I set the temperature low, I got 300 degrees; I wanted 350 degrees at one point and set the temperature to the highest, and only got 300 degrees... very unhappy. Don't know if I can still return this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubbling paint on interior door caused by low heat
customer_reviews.text: After using this product three times the paint on the inside of the door started bubbling. The temp was only 240°. Don't think I would recommend this product Update you’d think the seller or the manufacturer would of contacted me to discuss this product. Never heard a word from anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Dudeman

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Be careful on the heat as if you don't get it right you will turn your meat into a cinder. I am finally getting, well maybe not good at smoking but less bad. As for the smoker itself it is amazing. Simple to use and almost idiot proof.
customer_reviews.author: Renoun

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact there are no messy lava rocks to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks much faster than my old Brinkman smoker - 3 hours, instead of 4 1⁄2 hours. I like the fact there are no messy lava rocks to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: M. May

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of light use.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this smoker to begin with, but the element just went out today while preheating. I am going to look for a new one now and if it costs too much ill just cut a hole in the side and weld a box onto it. I just looked at the information on it's page and the manufacturer mentions having porcelain lined chip and water trays in a feature list on the side. They are not lined, and in fact are showing signs of rust. I purchased it August 19, 2018 and it is February 3, 2019 so it lasted just over 6 months, but I haven't really used it that much.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It was not fun, but we got it done easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smoker. Ever. I didn't realize how much of it I would have to put together when it arrived. It was not fun, but we got it done easily. The top of the unit was dented. I didn't want to file a claim and wait for a new one, so I am keeping it. I am not a fan, but the dent does not change the function. I made ribs the next day, they were incredible. I wish it came with three internal racks, instead of just two. I am going to see if I can order another set. Works well. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Royal Bush

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bypass this ITEM it's JUST DOESN'T WORK CORRECTLY! I called manufacturer like they suggested before trying to send back. She told me she would send new dial and coil for me to replace. But she wanted me to buy a thermostat to test the meat inside. If the dial tells you 200/ 250 then thats what it is!. Anyway coil & low high gauge was replaced! 🤦🏽‍♀️ NOW IT DOESN'T PASS 175 WITH TEMP ITS WORST THEN BEFORE
customer_reviews.author: Brown Suga

customer_reviews.title: Smoker works fine. I kind of wish I had spent a ...
customer_reviews.text: Smoker works fine. I kind of wish I had spent a little more though and bought on that was little nicer that automically adjusts the temperature and that lets you put new wood chips in without opening front door. You get what you pay for. Also a thermometer probe that goes into the meat so you know what the temperature of the meat is would be nice too. Overall the smoker works as described. I’m not sure how accurate the thermometer is on it. It seemed to take a lot longer to hear up when we put meat into it than when it was empty. We couldn’t get it past 225 on high when it was full for some reason
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Smoker is defective and in general made of poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: I received this smoker a few days ago. 1. The instructions for assemble were not complete. 2. After assembly which took a long time because I had to figure much out myself, I plugged the smoker control to cure the smoker as instructed in the directions only to find the element or control is defective and will not heat. Carefully reading the instruction manual it states "DO NOT SPILL WATER,MARINADED OR ANY LIQUID ONTO THE ELECTRIC ELEMENT AND CONTROLLER." These are located at the bottom of the smoker with any protection. How can you smoke without drippings dropping down. A COA statement if there ever was one. I have requested a RGA and SH is off my list.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Bostic

customer_reviews.title: Beware heating element
customer_reviews.text: Liked the versatility, this is a light weight smoker. Good when moving to different parts of patio or garage. We bought two of them. Both went out. Heating elements are NOT RELIABLE AT ALL. Do your research and buy a smoker that uses an Universal Heating element and not a specific one for this model. Buy the, insurance. Spare heating elements are NOT AVAILABLE.
customer_reviews.author: keitel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with ease of use and quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Took about 30 minutes. Smoked a brisket and some sausages on first try and receive rave reviews from my BBQ guest. Was easy to reach desired temperature and smoker maintain through out the porcess with no adjustments needed.l
customer_reviews.author: D Etter

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving Photo Beware of Dementions.
customer_reviews.text: I hate company's who try to deceive ppl. Well I was. Photo shows what they state inside dimensions are. Well they are not. Inside dimensions 12 inches wide,11 inches deep, and no where near 26 inches tall. Shame on you Smoke Hollow and Amazon ! I put together before checking measurements . It may smoke a small chicken, but no way even a 9 pound turkey. Don't try calling their website. They won't answer . I still have the box and will probably send it back. I understand it was small but not that small.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Using this smoker was SHOCKING ... literally unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I got about a year to year and a half of infrequent use out of this smoker. To be fair, it usually did an amazing job. Chicken I cooked on it came out so moist and flavorful. Unfortunately, my major complaint came a few months ago when trying to use it and getting electrocuted! I checked the outlet with a tester and it's grounded and proper. Extension cord is fine. I don't know what happened, but I'm now too afraid of this thing to go near it. Zapped me good three times and I've given up.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Gangsta

customer_reviews.title: Heating element broke
customer_reviews.text: Great little smoker which I used about 6 times. But it's now useless because the heating element physically broke open. The replacement for the heating element requires buying a new controller. So now I will convert the smoker to propane as the replacement cost is asinine. Smoke Hollow says they have been promised a shipment of parts in March of 2019. The replacement heating element from Appliance Parts Factory is $140 as of 1/15/19. Why would any sane person pay $140 for a part for a smoker that they paid $80 for?
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It takes a half hour to assemble on the patio floor.. I should have put it on my workbench... Wish I would have bought a bigger one now but this really does work fine. Wish it had more shelves/racks but I did find a source for a nice stainless rack with pan that fits it perfectly.. Love the pan as it catches all drips and lined with foil is so easy to clean.. Here is a link to the really nice stainless rack and pan..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement ! Burner caught fire !
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this smoker in June 2017 We have used it twice and was a great little smoker Today after plugging it in and turning it on, it began smoking and the burner was sparking and caught fire . Now the burner will not work . I would like to contact the manufacturer for a replacement burner or another smoker .
customer_reviews.author: Denise M Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Temp control is tricky, but a solid smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Assembly is pretty straight forward. The only issue is that it can be tricky to hold a temperature above 225 if it’s not warm enough outside. Closing the vent on the back most of the way can be very helpful with that issue, however, and this is a great smoker if you’re a beginner or don’t want to mess with a fire at all. They also make propane smokers for slightly more, and if you intend to be semi serious about smoking meat, I cannot recommend the larger propane model enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brewer Ben

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used this yet. It was highly recommended by a good friend who loves it. That works for me. I must say however that the instructions for assembly were the most concise and simple that I have ever worked with. No assumptions or inadequate diagrams. I look forward to many great smoked delights! One complaint: the box says "manufactured in Nescho Missouri" which I was pretty excited about, but then off to the side it says "made in China"! What?!
customer_reviews.author: Adolph-Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good size, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my girlfriend's grandfather and he loves it! Works wonderfully, but be careful as it heats up super fast if you set it high. When we first used it we accidentally set it on medium and baked a roast in about 2 hours instead of smoking it for 9. Also, when you flip it over to put the legs on, make sure you lift the door of it first. We didn't realize it had open hinges and the open door fell off and hit concrete when we flipped it over. Didn't damage the door at all, but you wouldn't want it to fall on your toes.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Put together with ease. Turned on and seasoned as intructed. Never used a smoker before but love this. We smoked a chicken the first day. Took less time that we anticipated was amazing. Smoked a pork loin and it was amazing. Easy to use, holds temp, works great. Small amount if leakage if the juices where the seams are for the legs so watch where you use it to avoid stains. This fix not effect the function on the least. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bhembree

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for a while although a little difficult to dial in the desired temperature. Sat in garage for 6 months and now it needs a new element/temp control module. Not happy, about only got a little over a year of infrequent use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Janot

customer_reviews.title: Was ok, not not so much
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in June 2017. In May 2018, the electric element burned out. Under warranty. Pretty easy to get this replaced. Now, in October 2019, element has burned out again. Smoke Hollow requests must all be on line and out of warranty replacement parts don't seem to be an option to request. Not sure how to proceed. Obviously, the design of the product puts the electric element at risk as drippings fall directly down on top. Smoke Hollow customer service is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Liz  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bought for first smoker and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my first smoker. Assembly took about 30-40 minutes as you have to assemble everything but the box itself. I followed the directions to season the smoker before first use. The smoker held temperature very well. I used mesquite flavored wood chips to smoke a pork loin. Took a few hours to smoke and added water as needed. Pork loin turned out great. Comes with a couple adjustable shelves. Would recommend for first time smokers or for a seasoned vet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Branham

customer_reviews.title: Great value, no bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. It’s simple, straight forward and no frills, but does what I need. The temp control is a little awkward getting use to, but I suppose that’s the simplicity of it. I haven’t used it for a brisket as of yet, which I want, but have smoked chicken several times and some salmon. All of which turned out well. If you are looking for a budget smoker and not looking for bells and whistles, I’d recommend. I’ve had another brand before but not willing to shell out a load of dough $$ at this time. Can’t wait to get more smoking done
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: SMOKE HOLLOW PRODUCTS ARE GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: If my nephew hadn’t already thrown out the box I would return this piece of crap. With nothing in it, the smoker got above 300 degrees. With a few racks a ribs it will only get to 184 degrees. I’m probably gonna convert it to a wood or propane smoker so my nephews gift isn’t a total loss. I WILL NEVER BUY A SMOKE HOLLOW PRODUCT AGAIN!!! I don’t care if it’s the best priced and quickest available. I won’t buy it. Amazon or smoke hollow owes me money. Amazon if there is a way to return this product without having the original packaging please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: TIffanny millien

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this smoker
customer_reviews.text: The only way to get smoke is to turn up very hot but then everything cooks very fast. Heating element quit after using it about 10 times.I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, and wasn't difficult to put together. The wood chips last longer than expected, you don't need to replace them more than every 1.5-2 hours if you put enough chips in. Only two downsides. First, the insulation isn't great so if it's cold outside it can take a while to heat up, and if you're trying to do a higher temperature it may struggle to get there at all. Second, you have to open the door to replace the chips or water, and having the door open for only 20 seconds will drop your temperature by 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaW

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter smoker. Works great and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit finicky on the temperature as it is not insulated, but keep out of the wind and you're good to go. I will get a lot of use from this little unit. Great flavor is produced due to the design. A+ I don't use water as the heat sink... a nice cement brick works excellent! I would recommend to a friend without hesitation. Great price-point to enter the smoking arena.
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastPete

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've made some good stuff with this. Obviously it's small so you won't be smoking a feast. The temperature adjustment is very sensitive so just nudge it a little at a time, but once set it locks in very well. Minus one star for not having an easy solution for a drip pan at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: leec

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: Was good at first but after 7 or 8 smokes the inside has bubbled up and peeled from the inside bad and cant help but think the chemicals that must be cooking out of the coating thats basically melting off. I have never even had it on max heat. 15 smokes in now the inside sprayed black latex coating but cement stuck or whatever is driping the latex right onto my meat and i have to cover with tin foil always and the tin foil is always covered in the black dripsing of chemicals they sprayed the inside with that cant even handle the temps of a smoker
customer_reviews.author: chad jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm stupid when it comes to cooking, other than baking and over the stove. I was nervous to purchase this and even more nervous to assemble it. It's the easiest thing to assemble and use. I also highly recommend Project Smoke by Steven Raichlen. It's a terrific cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Dessa King

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ive made on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ive made on amazon!. Pro results for a weekend warrior! Me and my son enjoyed ease of use and the ribs come out restaurant quality if not better! When I ordered the smoker I also purchased a bottle of" two gringos chubacabra magic" and ill tell you I'm set for bbq no more going out! Much more fun to bbq with my son at home. Thermostat works perfectly with very little chips.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this little smoker. It was big enough to smoke a 15lb turkey but doesn't take up too much room. I had to add a pan to catch drippings so they wouldn't drip on the heat g element so I may look to see if they make an additional shelf so that I can use 2 shelved for smoking and one for the drip pan.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: It may be me!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried three times to smoke salmon. Only moderately successful. The wood chips would only light with my propane torch and was very hard to regulate temperature. Guess one has to step up with some bigger $$$$ to get really good results.
customer_reviews.author: GMA B

customer_reviews.title: Great intro smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. Look for Steve Hughes review, follow his steps, and you will be successful in your first cook. Assembly instructions are very well written. Great starter into smoking. I did Ribs for 7 hrs in this thing and they turned out great. Temperature fluctuation a little out there and I had to switch the cuts halfway through as top shelf was significantly cooler than bottom. Otherwise great unit.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeeeeJO

customer_reviews.title: Smoke Hollow smoker
customer_reviews.text: I've used this little guy four times and it has performed very well! Okay, I'm not a pro smoker, but this is a great appliance for a beginner or a middle of the road smoker such as moi. It's well built and the price is right. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The little smoke works great. It's easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled across this product by borrowing my neighbors to smoke salmon. My wife ended up using it five days straight - I had no choice but buy our own because the neighbors were getting concerned about me wearing it out! The little smoke works great. It's easy to assemble, easy to regulate the temperatures and seems to be well built. Since I've had it less than six months I will provide an update should I experience any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my last smoker shorted out. I love how much room this little smoker has! The only complaint I have is how the water dish sits inside. It's hard to get in and out when you need more water for a long smoke. Also, it's difficult to regulate temp with this one. But that's operator error. I'm still used to my old one. Overall I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaci

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible smoker. I don’t recommend it. It is not insulated and it leaks grease from all the corners. Also it never got hot enough, probably because it was not insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen Schrum

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker for the beginner. My husband is already looking at bigger ones! This is the perfect size for a table top. Fits quite a bit of meat. We've cooked 2 10lb pork butts without a problem. Make sure to purchase a good thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Heating element didn't last long only used it about 7 times
customer_reviews.text: I bought the thing a year ago and I liked it till the heating element blew itself in half, boo! Good for getting a feel for electric smoking but if you want something that will last this is not the one
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: I love the smoker it’s super simple to use. I smoke everything from chicken breast to vegetables to brisket try tip salmon and everything is turned out wonderful I love the smoker it’s super simple to use. I smoke everything from chicken breast to vegetables to brisket try tip salmon and everything turned out wonderful I highly recommend the smoker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for the price its great!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the whole smoking process. I wanted a smoker to learn with - that wouldnt destroy my bank account. so far this one is great! i have smoked ribs, chicken breasts and steaks. Only drawback is the water pan empties kind of fast and is not very easy to access and refill. but for the price its worth a little hassle!
customer_reviews.author: cathi veretto

customer_reviews.title: Great small smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Small, but a great smoker. Chicken, pork loin roast and beef brisket thus far,,,,all superb! Could use a larger water reservoir. Used hickory and Apple chips thus far. Love the taste. Electric bill moved upwards, but love the results of this small smoker. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Junko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker at a great price! It would be nice if the "temperature" dial had degrees instead of just high and low but you learn where you need to be. I love it. Works just as good as smokers that cost twice as much though maybe not as fancy or big
customer_reviews.author: keagdu72

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough but arrived damaged. Not really worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough but arrived damaged. Not really worth repacking and returning because I had to destroy the box to remover the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Poopy McGee

customer_reviews.title: No replacement element.
customer_reviews.text: Element burnt through itself and they dont sell a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Wattzon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Chip tray would not Mount properly, leaned against the heating element and scorched. Also paint on inside began to peel and Chip after only one use.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: You get whay you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: My smoker was ordered as a replacement for a heavy duty one that went up after several years. Don't let them kid you. The directions were terrible and it took over an hour to put all the pieces together. The unit is extremely light weight and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Setzer

customer_reviews.title: Grease pan doesn’t catch all of the runoff.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second use, the only problem I had was the grease that should drain to the drain plug in the middle ran to the back of the smoker and leaked on my concrete. On my second use I placed cardboard underneath catching the leakage. I spoke with a customer support person she didn’t have any remedies. My sidewalks where I have to use the smoker aren’t very level I turned the smoker around now the grease is coming out the front of the smoker!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Ross

customer_reviews.title: Arc’d my circuit breaker, customer support ghosted me
customer_reviews.text: Customer support essentially ghosted me after I provided pictures of the scorched heating element. Luckily Amazon accepted the return.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Use it once a month. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love smoking. Not weed or cigs, silly. But I love smoking meats. I really recommend going to Walmart for wood chips because you can get a bag for under $2 vs $6 on amazon. But overall, this smoker is great, but it can be tough to clean and when it's cold, it's hard to hold heat
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bourg

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my MIL who owns a restaurant. She absolutely loves this smoker. So easy to assemble & the electric is so convenient over propane. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: He is like that and usually is successful
customer_reviews.text: Does not cook the meat evenly. My husband is determined to make it work! He is like that and usually is successful ! He is keeping it but he loves a challenge. If you are a person who wants perfection right out of the box, avoid this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This smoker is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The Smoke Hallow smoker was worth the price I paid in the "scratch and dent" section of Amazon. The variable temperature controller is especially nice. I did build a stainless roof over the heating element to keep drippings off the coil and I moved the water tray away from the heating element. That being said, the smoked ribs are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: William Hinton

customer_reviews.title: New experience of smoking
customer_reviews.text: Really found instructions pretty easy to follow and some was just good common sense. Pictures always help. Love the meats I have been doing in the smoker and I find it very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. As long as whomever knows what they are doing, the food turns out great! So basically only when I cook
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have seasoned the smoker and used it once. The food turned out amazing. The only issue I have is the smoker was tripping my gfi. It may have been because it rained all day the day before. I had it covered but it is possible that the element had some moisture on it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend about two years and we are still using it! All during summer and every thanksgiving and Christmas we smoke a beautiful turkey in it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Garbage customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer support. Email only. Mal functioning heating element trips every breaker. Filled out warranty sheet, emailed, their reply was to fill out a warrant sheet. Never again. Expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: RGM1957

customer_reviews.title: Setting the temperature is a pain!!
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control is not set up in degrees, just numbers. Trying to set it to a certain temperature is hit and miss at best. Disappointing!! I’ve only used it once since I purchased it a years ago. Money wasted!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker for the money
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is perfect for just me and my husband. It is a tad bit on the small size and we have to cut our rib racks in half in order to fit. We actually do two meals in it, one rack of ribs and usually a whole chicken. Save on power and wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: lunchlady

customer_reviews.title: Nice but
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but was dented sent back got a larger smoker. If it wasn’t dented I would have kept it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first time but the second time the temperature went from 275 to 400 in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pakulski

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my now ex, he loved it ( apparently more than me ((ha!)) the few times I was around when he used it, it worked great and he was extremely happy. Would recommend and will buy myself one. I’m
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Arnwine

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk !!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF JUNK! Used this unit 5 times in 2 years, now the heating element is burned out and so far the manufacturer is offering no help. Lesson learned? You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Used only 3 times
customer_reviews.text: Used this smoker 3 times heating element inop Cost of replacement is over 80$ used that money to buy another brand
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Grease will drip out the legs, put on 1/4 plywood or tiles down if you don't want flooring stained. Small smoker, prob for beginners. Works great, I would recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the ease of assembly. Smokes just like advertised. The temp is easy to control and heats up quickly. Its a great "little" smoker. Wish i would have gone a little larger. Great for smoking for a small party, but if you wish to smoke for a large group get a bigger smoker.
customer_reviews.author: vol nation

customer_reviews.title: Temp on door is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Caution The temp badge is flat out wrong on the door. Make sure to use something that tells temp inside the box
customer_reviews.author: chris iwan

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Within one use, the paint in the inside bubbles up. It also did not heat up well and we could not trust the temperature inside. Returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted. This product does not work. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.text: Disgusted!... Fire Hazard!...This is not a smoker. Very unhappy with this product. 1. There is no way for the wood chips to burn and create smoke! 2. Grease from food drips directly onto the heating element causing a grease fire. 3. It's easier to just grill your food. I want my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: This works great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We have had the expensive smoker before. This works better and a lot easier to use then the more expensive ones.Cooked a pork butt last night and the taste is awesome. Would definitely get this again. We ordered one for a friend as a gift and they love it too
customer_reviews.author: Dianne E.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I put alot of stuff together. This was a little harder if you use the directions. Pictures are kinda crap. Didnt take long , maybe 15 min. Heats good and love that it has the latch to keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Gc hopper

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise smoking meats is so easy with this
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part is putting it together. Otherwise smoking meats is so easy with this, with incredible ease at temperature control between the vent and the temp dial, it gets up to temp very quickly and holds it even on cold, windy days, and I notice no difference being an electric smoker vs a gas one
customer_reviews.author: Logan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, paint melts off.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, that is paint peeling off, this just arrived yesterday, I put it together, seasoned exactly per the instructions, used it to cook our thanksgiving turkey, and I'm now questioning weather I should eat the turkey or not, the bacon has a chemical, taste, don't buy I'll be returning this, asap.
customer_reviews.author: electrichulk

customer_reviews.title: Temp control not good
customer_reviews.text: Food on bottom rack burns by the time top rack is done
customer_reviews.author: Aletha

customer_reviews.title: THIS is a great smoker for the money
customer_reviews.text: THIS is a great smoker for the money. I have done three tenderloins and they have come out great. if you will only be smoking a little you cant go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.author: scott haddy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great entry level smoker. I like the fact that it electric and is light and portable
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Buy this smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smoker! My husband & I bought one for our anniversary this year. He has smoked so many delicious meats that come out perfect every time. Definitely one of the best gifts for we've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoker
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed these smokers. They do a great job. Anyone that gets one should be happy.
customer_reviews.author: THE EAGLE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smoker for my husband's birthday because he's wanted one for a while now. I was a little apprehensive about it being priced at what it was, but I definitely feel like I got more than my money's worth! He assembled it rather quickly and we just smoked an 8 lb. pork shoulder in 7 hours. It was amazing! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Williamson

customer_reviews.title: It does not come with wood you have to buy that separately
customer_reviews.text: The smoker was awesome reasonable by everything on it worked great assembling the smoker was easy food taste very flavorful and juicy the only con was it was slightly smaller then I expected overall great experience
customer_reviews.author: Shauntaleshia emory

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is great! I smoked a turkey for Thanksgiving and it came out great. Gets much hotter than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Dusbabek

customer_reviews.title: Smoking is ez and it’s very adjustable to your tastes.
customer_reviews.text: The smoker took awhile to assemble but no big deal. I found that soaking the wood chips should only be done for things you want less smoke flavor. Or longer cooking times.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Van

customer_reviews.title: Husbands favorite present
customer_reviews.text: The handle was broken on my unit when I received it. The packaging was thrown away and picked up by the garbage people before the unit was completely put together. I have no way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Our first smoker and we love it. Have used it several times and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mullet man

customer_reviews.title: Small water tray, give plenty of time to heat up
customer_reviews.text: Item does a good job of cooking but doesn't seems to get above 260 degrees in the cold. Inside can be kind of a mess to clean and water tray anlittle small.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee penrod

customer_reviews.title: It's a great smoker, easy to use, but you need an internal meat thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: All the one star reviews nearly scared me off this great smoker, I bought it anyway, I love it. Most of the one star reviews are about the temp knob, but the thing about smoking is you don't just set it like an oven. Its an active process of measuring the temp of the meat and planning the temp around that and the chips.
customer_reviews.author: Abby N.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble - instructions were included and it went ...
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I had hoped for the amount of money I spent. This was an entry level smoker for my dad. It was easy to assemble - instructions were included and it went together well. He used it for the first time yesterday and made a delicious pork loin his first time using it. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to get into smoking but doesn't want to spend too much out of the gate.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My unit is not able to regulate the temperature, it is either on high or off.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: great smoker for budget
customer_reviews.text: use this product twice already such a great smoker foods taste better a nd easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Heating element is not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Only used this unit for a few months and it started to trip my GFCI. After further investigation, saw that the heating element was cracked in two places. Seems it is a common issue with this model. I would not recommend this unit or company.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Latino

customer_reviews.title: Decent smoker
customer_reviews.text: Unit itself works ok. Cord and knob are not great quality, wear out over short time. Weve used for past 6 months..maybe 2x a month and now expercing issues
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm stuck with it
customer_reviews.text: Not well made. Doesn't even burn wood to make smoke. Doesn't even tell the right temperature. Now I'm stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: christopher vorhies

customer_reviews.title: which tasted wonderful and filled the backyard with an amazing aroma
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a father's day present - and it was very well received. We've had pulled pork now, which tasted wonderful and filled the backyard with an amazing aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Quintenz

customer_reviews.title: I love this smoker
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker, but the water and wood pans are incredibly small. You have to open the door to add either, letting out prescious head and smoke.
customer_reviews.author: drobbins

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Turkey never tasted so good
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Turkey never tasted so good. Easy to set up, just follow instructions, and is not difficult to figure out how to control the amount of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: MVL

product_meta.title: Smoke Hollow 26142E 26-Inch Electric Smoker with Adjustable Temperature Control
product_meta.description: -Chrome-plated cooking grids are included & can be adjusted to variable cooking heights in the grid track system. -commercial quality heat indicator & wood chip & water pan are included to achieve the best results for smoker-style cooking. -fully-welded steel cabinet includes side handles, cool-touch spring wire handle with sure-lock latch system & adjustable draft controls. -includes 1500W heating element with fully adjustable & removable temperature control. -power: 110V -internal heater wattage: 1500W -maximum temperature: 325 Fahrenheit -minimum temperature: 175 Fahrenheit -fuel type: electricity -overall height - top to bottom: 35.5" -overall width - side to side: 19
feature_bullets: Includes 1500-watt heating element with fully adjustable temperature control
Two (2) chrome-plated cooking grids are included and can be Adjusted to variable heights
Side handles and cool-touch spring wire door handle with latch system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars478 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
